name: Battle Ready
description: With new worlds joining the Federation, Starfleet is reevaluating its physical education to include martial arts from around the galaxy. But when a group of cadets pick a fight, the quality of Starfleet's future becomes the question of the day.
rules:
-- Unique Augments, Hirogen, and Klingon Empire Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Worf, Jaxa, W. Riker, K. Riker, or Duelists will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Worf, Jaxa, W. Riker, K. Riker, or Duelists
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Reed
featured_crew.flavor: In the alternate timeline, Reed was promoted to be captain of the Intrepid. However, he did not assume command due to the Xindi attack.

featured_crew.name: Sito
featured_crew.flavor: As part of the “ancient ritual” of the gik'tal, Jaxa must defend herself against an opponent while blindfolded.

rewards.name: Augment Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Augments faction missions.

rewards.name: Hirogen Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Hirogen faction missions.

rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Worf
rewards.flavor: Security Chief for the U.S.S. Enterprise-D, he was the first Klingon to graduate from Starfleet Academy.

rewards.name: Augment Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Augments faction missions.

rewards.name: Hirogen Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Hirogen faction missions.

rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Worf
rewards.flavor: Worf teaches Jaxa using a fake advancement test he calls a gik’tail to encourage her to speak up.

rewards.name: Reed
rewards.flavor: In the alternate timeline, Reed was promoted to be captain of the Intrepid. However, he did not assume command due to the Xindi attack.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Reed
rewards.flavor: In the alternate timeline, Reed was promoted to be captain of the Intrepid. However, he did not assume command due to the Xindi attack.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

goals.flavor: Hunt the best technique with the Hirogen.

screens.text: "Thanks for joining us, Captain. The Academy's rethinking their training curriculum for martial arts and we wanted to get your input. Is there anything you would have changed in your Academy days?"

"Thinking back on my Academy days, there's plenty I'd change, but I couldn't discuss any of that on an open comm channel. I'm sure the cadets who decided to try out some of the fighting techniques they learned in a brawl with some Cardassians will look back in shame someday too."

"Though to be fair, it's the sort of stupid thing I would have done too. You're young, you feel like you can take on the galaxy, right up until you're on the wrong side of a phaser or on your back in sickbay after someone broke a mug of Romulan ale against the side of your head."
"It's the sort of thing that will get them killed, Commander. Those cadets have inflated egos and yet no sense of the way things truly are. What do you think, Captain?"
"Thanks for joining us, Captain. The Academy's rethinking their training curriculum for martial arts and we wanted to get your input. Is there anything you would have changed in your Academy days?"

"Thinking back on my Academy days, there's plenty I'd change, but I couldn't discuss any of that on an open comm channel. I'm sure the cadets who decided to try out some of the fighting techniques they learned in a brawl with some Cardassians will look back in shame someday too."

"Though to be fair, it's the sort of stupid thing I would have done too. You're young, you feel like you can take on the galaxy, right up until you're on the wrong side of a phaser or on your back in sickbay after someone broke a mug of Romulan ale against the side of your head."
"It's the sort of thing that will get them killed, Commander. Those cadets have inflated egos and yet no sense of the way things truly are. What do you think, Captain?"
"Thanks for joining us, Captain. The Academy's rethinking their training curriculum for martial arts and we wanted to get your input. Is there anything you would have changed in your Academy days?"

"Thinking back on my Academy days, there's plenty I'd change, but I couldn't discuss any of that on an open comm channel. I'm sure the cadets who decided to try out some of the fighting techniques they learned in a brawl with some Cardassians will look back in shame someday too."

"Though to be fair, it's the sort of stupid thing I would have done too. You're young, you feel like you can take on the galaxy, right up until you're on the wrong side of a phaser or on your back in sickbay after someone broke a mug of Romulan ale against the side of your head."
"It's the sort of thing that will get them killed, Commander. Those cadets have inflated egos and yet no sense of the way things truly are. What do you think, Captain?"
